personalInfo.name: Asmit Mishra
personalInfo.title: Engineering Student | Web & Data Enthusiast
personalInfo.bio: I am a student pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science from The National Institute of Engineering , Mysore with a focus on web technologies, data structures, and data visualization. I build interactive web applications and solve algorithmic problems using modern tools. My interests include frontend development and machine learning.

projects.title: Simple Calculator Web Application
projects.description: A responsive web-based calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that supports 8 arithmetic operations with input validation and error handling. Received 50+ positive GitHub reviews.

projects.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors Game
projects.description: An interactive game with 3 modes and real-time score tracking. Built with JS event handling to ensure smooth gameplay and 99% success in processing user inputs.

experience.description: Built two predictive ML models with ~15% improved accuracy, ranked top 25% in a beginner competition, and learned classification, cleaning, and statistical analysis.
Developed 4 dashboards using Python libraries; extracted insights from large datasets (>10K records).
Completed advanced C-based DSA curriculum; optimized solutions on LeetCode, improving runtime by 20%.
